item.title: Teaching
item.description:
You can download a draft (work in progress) of my teaching statement here. Spring 2018
Graduate Student Instructor with Professor Deb Nolan
STAT 198- Blogging for Data Science
Students write 4 posts during the semester related to mathematics, statistics, computer science, and/or data science. Two blog posts can be about anything related to mathematics, statistics, computer science, or data science and are brainstormed using Andrew Gelmanâ€™s diary activity Two blog posts are more technical: a vignette style blog post and a data analysis focused blog post.
